translations: n.（英）即将毕业的学生；即将接受学位者

sentences.sentence: It is my great pleasure to represent the University on behalf of the Vice-Chancellor on this special occasion to formally recognise the academic achievements of this years' Graduands.
sentences.translation: 在此特殊时刻，我为能够代表学校及校长表彰今年毕业生们所取得的优异学业成绩而感到非常高兴。
